lead_paragraph: Zimbabwe opener Hamilton Masakadza has been ruled out of the second test against New Zealand that begins at the Queens Sports Club on Saturday in a major blow to the hosts’ already slim hopes.

headline.print_headline: Zimbabwe’s Top Player Out of Second Test
headline.main: Zimbabwe’s Top Player Out of Second Test
